bibl.title: Report on the Activities of the Polish-Egyptian Archaeological Mission at Tell Atrib, 1998.
bibl.note: Excavation in the south-western part of the Ptolemaic quarter (ceramics, terracotta figurines, stamped handles of imported amphorae, coins).
bibl.seg: SZYMANSKA Hanna, Report on the Activities of the Polish-Egyptian Archaeological Mission at Tell Atrib, 1998.
Excavation in the south-western part of the Ptolemaic quarter (ceramics, terracotta figurines, stamped handles of imported amphorae, coins).
